title: Nickelodeon Is Bringing Back Rugrats, Ren & Stimpy, Hey Dude and More '90s Favorites
content: It's official : Nickelodeon's new programming lineup, The Splat, will consist of all your '90s favorites in the overnight block. The Splat will premiere on TeenNick on Monday, Oct. 5 and feature episodes of shows including All That , Are You Afraid of the Dark? , CatDog , Clarissa Explains It All , Hey Arnold! , Hey Dude , Kenan & Kel , The Ren & Stimpy Show , Legends of the Hidden Temple , Rocko's Modern Life , Rugrats  and Salute Your Shorts , airing between 10 p.m. and 6 a.m. every day. Nickelodeon says it plans to add more shows to The Splat throughout the year. Fall TV Popularity Contest: Which new shows won you over? Vote now! On Oct. 12, The Splat will showcase the best Reptar-themed episodes of Rugrats , and Oct. 19th will feature the best stoop-centric episodes of Hey Arnold! Will you watch The Splat? Which shows are you most looking forward to seeing again? Other Links From TVGuide.com
